Package ohos.ace.ability

Class AceDataAbility

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.app.AbilityContext
      • ohos.aafwk.ability.Ability
        • ohos.ace.ability.AceAbility
          • ohos.ace.ability.AceDataAbility
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAssistanceChannel, IAbilityContinuation, ILifecycle, Context

    public class AceDataAbility
extends AceAbility
    Child class of Ability. Any class specific to application running should derive from AceDataAbility.
    Since:
    7
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.ACE.UIEngine

    • Method Detail

      • onStart

        public void onStart​(Intent intent)
        Description copied from class: Ability
        Called back when an ability is started for initialization (it can be called only once in the entire lifecycle of an ability).

        Most initialization operations should be performed by calling this method. For example, you can use the current method to call Ability.setMainRoute(java.lang.String) and Ability.addActionRoute(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) to set the main router and action router for a Page ability.

        Overrides:
        onStart in class AceAbility
        Parameters:
        intent - Indicates information carried when this ability is started. Note: For a Service ability, null is passed.

        Overrides:

        Parameters:

      • onStop

        public void onStop​()
        Description copied from class: Ability
        Called back before an ability is destroyed.

        This method indicates the end of the ability lifecycle. It can be executed after the ability calls the Ability.terminateAbility() method or the last ability slice of the ability calls the AbilitySlice#terminate() method. Generally, this method is used to clear resources.

        Overrides:
        onStop in class AceAbility

      • normalizeUri

        public Uri normalizeUri​(Uri uri)
        Description copied from class: Ability
        Converts the given uri that refer to the Data ability into a normalized URI. A normalized URI can be used across devices, persisted, backed up, and restored. It can refer to the same item in the Data ability even if the context has changed.

        If you implement URI normalization for a Data ability, you must also implement Ability.denormalizeUri(ohos.utils.net.Uri) to enable URI denormalization. After this feature is enabled, URIs passed to any method that is called on the Data ability must require normalization verification and denormalization.

        The default implementation of this method returns null, indicating that this Data ability does not support URI normalization.

        Overrides:
        normalizeUri in class Ability
        Parameters:
        uri - Indicates the Uri object to normalize.
        Returns:
        Returns the normalized Uri object if the Data ability supports URI normalization; returns null otherwise.
        See Also:
        Ability.denormalizeUri(ohos.utils.net.Uri)

      • denormalizeUri

        public Uri denormalizeUri​(Uri uri)
        Description copied from class: Ability
        Converts the given normalized uri generated by Ability.normalizeUri(ohos.utils.net.Uri) into a denormalized one. The default implementation of this method returns the original URI passed to it.
        Overrides:
        denormalizeUri in class Ability
        Parameters:
        uri - uri Indicates the Uri object to denormalize.
        Returns:
        Returns the denormalized Uri object if the denormalization is successful; returns the original Uri passed to this method if there is nothing to do; returns null if the data identified by the original Uri cannot be found in the current environment.
        See Also:
        Ability.normalizeUri(ohos.utils.net.Uri)

      • getType

        public String getType​(Uri uri)
        Description copied from class: Ability
        Obtains the MIME type matching the data specified by the URI of the Data ability. This method should be implemented by a Data ability.

        Data abilities supports general data types, including text, HTML, and JPEG.

        Overrides:
        getType in class Ability
        Parameters:
        uri - Indicates the URI of the data.
        Returns:
        Returns the MIME type that matches the data specified by uri.

      • getFileTypes

        public String[] getFileTypes​(Uri uri,
                             String mimeTypeFilter)
        Description copied from class: Ability
        Obtains the MIME type of files. This method should be implemented by a Data ability.
        Overrides:
        getFileTypes in class Ability
        Parameters:
        uri - Indicates the path of the files to obtain.
        mimeTypeFilter - Indicates the MIME type of the files to obtain. This parameter cannot be set to null.

        1. "*/*": Obtains all types supported by a Data ability.

        2. "image/*": Obtains files whose main type is image of any subtype.

        3. "*/jpg": Obtains files whose subtype is JPG of any main type.

        Returns:
        Returns the MIME type of the matched files; returns null if there is no type that matches the Data ability.

      • openFile

        public FileDescriptor openFile​(Uri uri,
                               String mode)
                        throws FileNotFoundException
        Description copied from class: Ability
        Opens a file. This method should be implemented by a Data ability.
        Overrides:
        openFile in class Ability
        Parameters:
        uri - Indicates the path of the file to open.
        mode - Indicates the open mode, which can be "r" for read-only access, "w" for write-only access (erasing whatever data is currently in the file), "wt" for write access that truncates any existing file, "wa" for write-only access to append to any existing data, "rw" for read and write access on any existing data, or "rwt" for read and write access that truncates any existing file.
        Returns:
        Returns the FileDescriptor object of the file descriptor.
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - Throws this exception if the file does not exist.

                   String arg,

        extras - Indicates the PacMap parameter transferred by the method.
        Returns:

      • delete

        public int delete​(Uri uri,
                  DataAbilityPredicates predicates)
        Description copied from class: Ability
        Deletes one or more data records. This method should be implemented by a Data ability.
        Overrides:
        delete in class Ability
        Parameters:
        uri - Indicates the database table storing the data to delete.
        predicates - Indicates filter criteria. If this parameter is null, all data records will be deleted by default.
        Returns:
        Returns the number of data records deleted.

      • update

        public int update​(Uri uri,
                  ValuesBucket value,
                  DataAbilityPredicates predicates)
        Description copied from class: Ability
        Updates one or more data records in the database. This method should be implemented by a Data ability.
        Overrides:
        update in class Ability
        Parameters:
        uri - Indicates the database table storing the data to update.
        value - Indicates the data to update. This parameter can be null.
        predicates - Indicates filter criteria. If this parameter is null, all data records will be updated by default.
        Returns:
        Returns the number of data records updated.

      • insert

        public int insert​(Uri uri,
                  ValuesBucket value)
        Description copied from class: Ability
        Inserts a data record into the database. This method should be implemented by a Data ability.
        Overrides:
        insert in class Ability
        Parameters:
        uri - Indicates the position where the data is to insert.
        value - Indicates the data to insert.
        Returns:
        Returns the index of the newly inserted data record.

      • query

        public ResultSet query​(Uri uri,
                       String[] columns,
                       DataAbilityPredicates predicates)
        Description copied from class: Ability
        Queries one or more data records in the database. This method should be implemented by a Data ability.
        Overrides:
        query in class Ability
        Parameters:
        uri - Indicates the database table storing the data to query.
        columns - Indicates the columns to be queried, in array, for example, {"name","age"}. You should define the processing logic when this parameter is null.
        predicates - Indicates filter criteria. If this parameter is null, all data records will be queried by default.
        Returns:
        Returns the queried data.

      • executeBatch

        public DataAbilityResult[] executeBatch​(ArrayList<DataAbilityOperation> operations)
                                 throws OperationExecuteException
        Description copied from class: Ability
        Performs batch operations on the database. This method should be implemented by a Data ability.

        The batch operations to be executed on the database are encapsulated as DataAbilityOperation objects. Each object corresponds to an operation, for example, inserting or deleting. The call result of each operation is saved to and returned by the data array of the DataAbilityResult type.

        Overrides:
        executeBatch in class Ability
        Parameters:
        operations - Indicates the data operation list, which can contain multiple operations on the database.
        Returns:
        Returns the result of each operation, in array.
        Throws:
        OperationExecuteException - Throws this exception if the batch operation fails.

      • setInstanceName

        public void setInstanceName​(String name)
        Sets an instance name.
        Overrides:
        setInstanceName in class AceAbility
        Parameters:
        name - Indicates the instance name. The value cannot be an empty string. Otherwise, your application cannot run properly.
        Since:
        7
